entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a wizard who is riding on a broomstick.

entities.name: dragon
entities.description: A large dragon that is guarding eggs.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: A person who is watching the scene and commenting on it.

entities.name: eggs
entities.description: The eggs that Harry is trying to steal from the dragon.

relationships.description: Harry is attacking the dragon by diving towards it.
Harry is stealing the eggs from the dragon.
The dragon is defending its eggs against Harry's attack.
Bagman is watching Harry as he steals the eggs.
